titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Coya Knutson.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Coya Knutson.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Honors the life and legacy of Coya Knutson (a former U.S. Representative), whose dedication to overcoming exceptional odds and devotion to the well-being of the United States shall serve as an inspiration for generations of individuals in the United States.
